function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus has different survival times on different surfaces, posing a risk of surface transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces and promotion of hand hygiene","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, UV-C sterilization, antimicrobial coatings","People":"People in indoor environments, healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Positive correlation between COVID-19 infection and air pollution, leading to increased morbidity","Impact":"Higher risk of severe illness and death for infected individuals in polluted areas","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution levels, promoting respiratory health, and providing access to clean air","Technologies":"Air purifiers, emission control technologies, urban planning for green spaces","People":"Residents in areas with high air pollution, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government authorities, public health organizations"}]}
